name: Herder Quest
description:
A platformer based on the classic wolf-goat-lettuce-boat puzzle. Arrow keys or wasd to move, up or w to jump, space to pick up or put down your animals (and lettuce).

Thanks to the talented people who created the assets I bought for this game:
https://finalbossblues.itch.io/animals-sprite-pack

And a special thanks to the talented and generous people who made their assets available for free!
https://opengameart.org/content/villagers-sprite-sheets-pixel-art-pack
https://opengameart.org/content/flags-0
https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-wolf-animation
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/magic-cliffs-pixel-art-environment-60458
https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/buddy
